trans-unit.source: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.
trans-unit.target: WCF(Windows Communication Foundation) 서비스에 적용되어 이 서비스를 ASP.NET 호환 코드로 실행할 수 있는지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: When applied to a service implementation class, this attribute indicates whether this service requires or supports [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode to be enabled for the hosting application domain (AppDomain).
trans-unit.target: 서비스 구현 클래스에 적용된 경우 이 특성은 해당 서비스가 호스팅 AppDomain(응용 프로그램 도메인)에 사용될 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 호환 모드를 필요로 하는지 또는 지원하는지를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: AppDomains hosting [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services can run in two different hosting modes:
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 서비스를 호스팅하는 AppDomains는 두 가지 호스팅 모드로 실행될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Mixed Transports Mode (Default): In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services do not participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 혼합 전송 모드(기본값): 이 모드에서 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 서비스는 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP 파이프라인에 참여하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: This guarantees that a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service behaves consistently, independent of hosting environment and transport.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 서비스가 호스팅 환경 및 전송과 독립적으로 일관성 있게 작동할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Compatibility Mode: In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline in a manner similar to ASMX services.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 호환 모드: 이 모드에서 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 서비스는 ASMX 서비스와 유사한 방식으로 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP 파이프라인에 참여합니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] features such as File Authorization, UrlAuthorization, and HTTP Session State are applicable to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services running in this mode.
trans-unit.target: 이 모드로 실행되는 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 서비스에는 파일 권한 부여, URL 권한 부여, HTTP 세션 상태 등과 같은 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 기능을 적용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The hosting mode is controlled by the application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅 모드는 응용 프로그램 수준의 구성 플래그 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`를 통해 제어됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This flag is `false` by default and thus [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services run in the Mixed Transports Mode unless you explicitly opt into the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode.
trans-unit.target: 이 플래그는 기본적으로 `false`이므로 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 호환 모드를 명시적으로 선택하지 않는 한 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 서비스는 혼합 전송 모드로 실행됩니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 호환 모드 참조 [ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> property to do this.
trans-unit.target: 이렇게 하려면 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> 속성을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: At runtime, applications can detect if [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.AspNetCompatibilityEnabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 런타임에 응용 프로그램은 static 속성 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]의 값을 확인하여 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.AspNetCompatibilityEnabled%2A> 호환 모드가 사용되는지를 감지할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> property on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode.Required> as shown in the following example
trans-unit.target: 서비스 개발자가 설정 하 여 해당 서비스는 ASP.NET 호환 모드에만 실행 되도록 할 수는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> 속성에는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute> 를 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode.Required> 다음 예제와 같이

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스에 필요한 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 호환성 수준을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode" /> that indicates the services required degree of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 서비스에 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode" /> 수준의 호환성이 필요함을 나타내는 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode.Allowed" />.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode.Allowed" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> property to set the hosting mode in code.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅 모드를 코드에 설정하려면 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute.RequirementsMode%2A> 속성을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: This can also be done by setting an application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 수준의 구성 플래그 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`를 설정하여 이 작업을 수행할 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md).

trans-unit.source: At runtime, applications can detect whether [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.AspNetCompatibilityEnabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 런타임에 응용 프로그램은 static 속성 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]의 값을 확인하여 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.AspNetCompatibilityEnabled%2A> 호환 모드가 사용되는지 여부를 감지할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid one for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode" /><see langword="enum" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 값이 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode" /><see langword="enum" />에 유효한 값이 아닌 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" /> of the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스의 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> used to host the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스를 호스팅하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> that contains the endpoints for the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스에 대한 끝점을 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> 형식의 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection" /> that contains the parameters that the binding elements for the service can access.
trans-unit.target: 서비스의 바인딩 요소에서 액세스할 수 있는 매개 변수를 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds custom data that the binding elements can access to support the implementation of the contract.
trans-unit.target: 바인딩 요소에서 계약 구현을 지원하기 위해 액세스할 수 있는 사용자 지정 데이터를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" /> of the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스의 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> for hosting the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스를 호스팅하기 위한 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Checks that the type of hosting is consistent with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.
trans-unit.target: 호스팅 유형이 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 호환성 요구 사항과 일치하는지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="description" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="description" />가 <see langword="null" />인 경우

trans-unit.source: The service hosting is not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 호스팅이 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 호환성 요구 사항과 호환되지 않는 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" /> of the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스의 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> for hosting the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스를 호스팅하기 위한 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Validates the service behavior.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 동작의 유효성을 검사합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.
